alert.note: Alert for Mariposa Madera Foothills; Mariposa-Madera Lower Sierra; Yosemite NP outside of the valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 6:02PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL MARIPOSA AND SOUTHERN TUOLUMNE COUNTIES THROUGH 630 PM PDT... At 600 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southeast of Smith Station, or 22 miles northwest of Yosemite South Entrance. This storm is nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Crane Flat and Hodgdon Meadow Campground. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
